name: Uprooted (Marissa Manley)
description:
Description

Once upon a time, a man named Rootie built a bed and breakfast on top of a magical tree. Building over fantastical roots has made his new home haunted, and when things start coming to life Rootie learns he has to take down the tree from its roots.

Instructions

Pick up objects and craft them together to make weapons! It's the only way you'll stand a chance against the tree!

  • WASD move
  • E inventory+craft menu
  • Esc to quit
  • Left click attack

Credits

Art - Morgan/Kath/Marissa

Programming - Thad/Marissa/Julian

Sound - Seth
